main event: A witness observed a round object with a tail in the sky on November 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object was round, white with a blue tail, and the size of a baseball., The tail flashed on and off, seeming to glow when it was off., The object moved slowly back and forth, up and down., The witness was lying in bed thinking of Sputnik when they first saw it., The sighting concluded it was likely an astronomical object, possibly the star Vega.
witness description: witness was lying in bed, thought it was Sputnik at first
